{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
    <PUBLISHER>Herrn Johann Heinrich Flick Buchbinder an der Freyenstraße</PUBLISHER>
    <PUBLISHER_LOCATION>Freyenstraße</PUBLISHER_LOCATION>
    <ADVERTISEMENT>
        <TITLE>der hinckende Mercurius, oder neue Calender</TITLE>
        <SUBTITLE>darinnen das sehr curiose Gespräch im Reich der Todten, zwischen dem Lord Lopat, welcher im Jahr <YEAR>1747</YEAR> den 23. April, wegen der Schottländischen Rebellion, zu London ist enthauptet worden, und anderer Personen, die im verwichenen Jahr ein unglückseliges Ende auf der Welt genohmen, vorstellende die Straffe des Bösen und Belohnung des Guten</SUBTITLE>
        <PRICE>6 kr.</PRICE>
    </ADVERTISEMENT>
    <ADVERTISEMENT>
        <TITLE>Der Durchlauchtigste Welt-Begriff aller jetztregierender Hubertern des gantzen Erd-Kreises</TITLE>
        <YEAR>1748</YEAR>
        <PRICE>4 xr.</PRICE>
    </ADVERTISEMENT>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":10,"explanation":"The original input was embedded within a JSON string, not raw XML. I extracted the content of 'xml_string' and fixed/restructured it into valid, semantic XML suitable for an Avisblatt entry. Corrections included: 1. Replacing unicode/malformed characters (like \u221a\u00fc, \u221a\u00b7, \u221a\u2202) with standard German characters (e.g., ß, ä, ö, ü). 2. Restructuring the content: Separating the bookseller information from the items being sold. 3. Correcting the structure: Using specific tags like <PUBLISHER>, <ADVERTISEMENT>, <SUBTITLE> where the original used nested <BIBL> tags inconsistently and without clear separation for the seller.
4. Removing the leading item number '15.' as it's typically document metadata, not content for the book description itself. 5. Correcting '<YEAR>1747.</YEAR>' to '<YEAR>1747</YEAR>' and similar for consistency. 6. Correcting '<PRIZE>' to '<PRICE>' for standard consistency (though PRIZE might be contextually correct, PRICE is more generic for XML structures)."}

<ITEM>
    <PUBLISHER>Herrn Johann Heinrich Flick Buchbinder an der Freyenstraße</PUBLISHER>
    <PUBLISHER_LOCATION>Freyenstraße</PUBLISHER_LOCATION>
    <ADVERTISEMENT>
        <TITLE>der hinckende Mercurius, oder neue Calender</TITLE>
        <SUBTITLE>darinnen das sehr curiose Gespräch im Reich der Todten, zwischen dem Lord Lopat, welcher im Jahr <YEAR>1747</YEAR> den 23. April, wegen der Schottländischen Rebellion, zu London ist enthauptet worden, und anderer Personen, die im verwichenen Jahr ein unglückseliges Ende auf der Welt genohmen, vorstellende die Straffe des Bösen und Belohnung des Guten</SUBTITLE>
        <PRICE>6 kr.</PRICE>
    </ADVERTISEMENT>
    <ADVERTISEMENT>
        <TITLE>Der Durchlauchtigste Welt-Begriff aller jetztregierender Hubertern des gantzen Erd-Kreises</TITLE>
        <YEAR>1748</YEAR>
        <PRICE>4 xr.</PRICE>
    </ADVERTISEMENT>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
The original input was embedded within a JSON string, not raw XML. I extracted the content of 'xml_string' and fixed/restructured it into valid, semantic XML suitable for an Avisblatt entry. Corrections included: 1. Replacing unicode/malformed characters (like \u221a\u00fc, \u221a\u00b7, \u221a\u2202) with standard German characters (e.g., ß, ä, ö, ü). 2. Restructuring the content: Separating the bookseller information from the items being sold. 3. Correcting the structure: Using specific tags like <PUBLISHER>, <ADVERTISEMENT>, <SUBTITLE> where the original used nested <BIBL> tags inconsistently and without clear separation for the seller.
4. Removing the leading item number '15.' as it's typically document metadata, not content for the book description itself. 5. Correcting '<YEAR>1747.</YEAR>' to '<YEAR>1747</YEAR>' and similar for consistency. 6. Correcting '<PRIZE>' to '<PRICE>' for standard consistency (though PRIZE might be contextually correct, PRICE is more generic for XML structures).
